roleset.name: to make lively or spirited, animate
roleset.note: ENLIVEN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'enliven' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from enliven.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gerund
example.text: He distinguished the two cases : In Salinger , Judge Leval noted [0] [*T*-1], [the quotations]-1 were for the purpose of [*] -1 enlivening the biography rather than of [*] proving points about the subject .

roleset.name: make cheerful
roleset.note: LIVEN_UP-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from liven.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: John livened us all up with his stage act.
